languages.text: Рабочие прометиумной станции подняли мятеж из-за смертельно опасных условий труда. Люди угрожают подорвать запасы топлива, если их требования не будут выполнены.
The workers at one of the promethium stations are revolting because of life-threatening working conditions. They are threatening to detonate the fuel stores unless their demands are met.
languages.original_text: Рабочие прометиумной станции подняли мятеж из-за смертельно опасных условий труда. Люди угрожают подорвать запасы топлива, если их требования не будут выполнены.

traits.locale_text: The workers at one of the promethium stations are revolting because of life-threatening working conditions. They threaten to detonate the fuel storages unless their demands are met.
The flames of rebellion flare up across the colony. Sick of extortions and punishments, the subjects urge their peers to abandon the Rogue Trader's patronage.
The workers at one of the promethium stations are revolting because of life-threatening working conditions. They are threatening to detonate the fuel stores unless their demands are met.
The flames of rebellion flare up across the colony. Sick of extortions and punishments, the subjects urge their peers to abandon the Rogue Trader's patronage.

The workers at one of the promethium stations are revolting because of life-threatening working conditions. They threaten to detonate the fuel storages unless their demands are met.

The workers at one of the promethium stations are revolting because of life-threatening working conditions. They are threatening to detonate the fuel stores unless their demands are met.

languages.text: Les ouvriers affectés à l'une des stations de prométhium se révoltent contre leurs conditions de travail potentiellement meurtrières. Ils menacent de faire exploser les dépôts de carburant si leurs exigences ne sont pas satisfaites.
languages.original_text: The workers at one of the promethium stations are revolting because of life-threatening working conditions. They are threatening to detonate the fuel stores unless their demands are met.

traits.locale_text: Les ouvriers affectés à l'une des stations de prométhium se révoltent contre leurs conditions de travail potentiellement meurtrières. Ils menacent de faire exploser les dépôts de carburant si leurs exigences ne sont pas satisfaites.

languages.text: あるプロメチウム・ステーションで働く労働者たちが、生命を脅かす労働条件のゆえに反乱を起こしている。彼らは、要求が満たされなければ燃料貯蔵所を爆発させると脅している。
languages.original_text: The workers at one of the promethium stations are revolting because of life-threatening working conditions. They are threatening to detonate the fuel stores unless their demands are met.

traits.locale_text: あるプロメチウム・ステーションで働く労働者たちが、生命を脅かす労働条件のゆえに反乱を起こしている。彼らは、要求が満たされなければ燃料貯蔵所を爆発させると脅している。

languages.text: 某座钷素精炼站的工人集体罢工，抗议工作条件太差，严重威胁生命安全。他们威胁行商浪人满足他们的要求，否则就会引爆钷素仓库。
languages.original_text: The workers at one of the promethium stations are revolting because of life-threatening working conditions. They are threatening to detonate the fuel stores unless their demands are met.

traits.locale_text: 某座钷素精炼站的工人集体罢工，抗议工作条件太差，严重威胁生命安全。他们威胁行商浪人满足他们的要求，否则就会引爆钷素仓库。

languages.text: Los trabajadores de una estación de prometio se están rebelando debido a la peligrosidad de sus condiciones laborales. Amenazan con detonar las reservas de combustible si no se atiende a sus demandas.
languages.original_text: The workers at one of the promethium stations are revolting because of life-threatening working conditions. They are threatening to detonate the fuel stores unless their demands are met.

traits.locale_text: Los trabajadores de una estación de prometio se están rebelando debido a la peligrosidad de sus condiciones laborales. Amenazan con detonar las reservas de combustible si no se atiende a sus demandas.

languages.text: Die Arbeiter an einer der Promethium-Stationen rebellieren wegen der lebensgefährlichen Arbeitsbedingungen. Sie drohen, die Treibstoffvorräte in die Luft zu jagen, wenn ihre Forderungen nicht erfüllt werden.
languages.original_text: The workers at one of the promethium stations are revolting because of life-threatening working conditions. They are threatening to detonate the fuel stores unless their demands are met.

traits.locale_text: Die Arbeiter an einer der Promethium-Stationen rebellieren wegen der lebensgefährlichen Arbeitsbedingungen. Sie drohen, die Treibstoffvorräte in die Luft zu jagen, wenn ihre Forderungen nicht erfüllt werden.

languages.text: Prometyum istasyonlarından birindeki işçiler, hayati tehlike arz eden çalışma koşulları nedeniyle isyan ediyor. Talepleri karşılanmazsa yakıt depolarını patlatmakla tehdit ediyorlar.
languages.original_text: The workers at one of the promethium stations are revolting because of life-threatening working conditions. They are threatening to detonate the fuel stores unless their demands are met.
